sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Updates requested item record's state to Closed Complete
Updates vehicle tracker record's vehicle status to Returned to Warehouse and Tracker Status to Cancelled
Creates a record on vehicle tracker table. Also mapped variables from requested item record
Gets the Variables from the service catalog requested item record

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Updates the requested item record's state to Closed Incomplete
Asks Approval from Loaner Vehicle Approvers group
creates a delivery catalog task and assigns to Loaner Vehicle Delivery group
Updates vehicle tracker record's vehicle status to Out on Field
